list_definition.definition: an arrangement by which a person keeps his or her money in a bank

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I have (opened) an account with the local bank.
Send me an account of the money which I owe.

list_definition.definition: a description or explanation (of something that has happened)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He gave us a full account of his visit to Vienna.

list_definition.definition: an arrangement by which a person makes a regular (eg monthly) payment instead of paying at the time of buying

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I have an account at Smiths.

list_definition.definition: a record of money received and spent

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: You must keep your accounts in order
